metadata.description: Samurai has a hereditary class of warriors in Japan during its feudal times. Finally, this name has come to mean the best, the best example of that, the best example of that, the best example of that. And 5% of Japanese people belong to this group. It connects the warrior of samurai hara-kiri with ceremonial suicide. . Samurai followed the bushido laws of martial virtues, indifference to pain, and unwavering loyalty.
